words.source: H1121 (בֵּן, 'son'), noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'The sons of', ESV 'The sons of', NASB 'The sons of'
H1648 (גֵּרְשׁוֹן, 'Gershon'), proper noun; KJV 'Gershon', ESV 'Gershon', NASB 'Gershon'
H3845 (לִבְנִי, 'Libni'), proper noun; KJV 'Libni', ESV 'Libni', NASB 'Libni'
H8096 (שִׁמְעִי, 'Shimei'), conjunction + proper noun; KJV 'and Shimi', ESV 'and Shimei', NASB 'and Shimei'
H4940 (מִשְׁפָּחָה, 'clan/family'), preposition-lamed + noun common feminine plural construct + 3mp suffix; KJV 'according to their families', ESV 'by their clans', NASB 'by their families'
